feed.title: Urrova's stuff
feed.subtitle: Strange music, Soundtracks, Modding, Old AF videogamees, and more??

entry.title: Site rebuild (did you notice??)
entry.content:
Hi guys i'm the Urrova, i didnt die xd.

The website is in reconstruction, cause i got tired from throwing HTML like crazy; i've rebuilt it to use a framework (11ty), for making the pages of the site faster.

Expect things from me! (i'll upload more things i swear).

And they ask, why using 11ty and not what the Normals use a.k.a React? Cause i dont have money for a server with backend :(

entry.title: New music: Nitroglicerin Powered
entry.content:
Hi im still alive xd

I've uploaded Nitroglicerin Powered, a theme i made using KORG M01 in a Nintendo DS Lite from 2006.

I'ts available on the music section! I'll upload it to youtube when i have an image to use as a cover.

Also FINALLY OUSIDE DOOM!

entry.title: Uploaded new MIDI: All My Homies Go To Mean Street
entry.content:
I uploaded a new MIDI I made for Grungo's DOOM project named OUTLAND. After I made it i got burnout AGAIN. Really I need to do stuff OUTSIDE DOOM this time.

I'ts available on the music section! Probably i'll upload it to Youtube then.

EDIT: Uploaded it to youtube, its available from the post's link.

entry.title: Uploading Amalgoom MIDIs to Youtube
entry.content:
As the title says, I'm uploading the MIDI music i made for Amalgoom to Youtube.

You can find it on my Youtube channel, and on my "Music" and "MIDIs to Doom the World" Playlists.

I'll update the website when I finish uploading them.

UPDATE 7-6-2025

How are you?? Finally i finished uploading my MIDIs for Amalgoom to Youtube.

You can find it on my Youtube channel, and on my "Music" and "MIDIs to Doom the World" Playlists.

Also I updated the music pages to point to the Youtube videos.

You can listen to the MIDIs on the youtube playlist or from the music page on the site.

entry.title: Amalgoom was Released!!
entry.content:
One of the Doom community projects I participated in came out literally yesterday.

It's a full game mod (they call it a megawad in Doomworld) that combines every map from Doom and Doom 2 into one. So you have Hangar from Doom + Entryway from Doom II, etc.

I contributed to this mod with four MIDIs, which you can find in the music section of the site.

Do you wanna play the mod? Download it from its Doomworld thread
